name: Elephant in the Room (Zahkros, ekaktusz)
description:
A little puzzle game for the GameOff 2022 gamejam.
The theme was cliche, and we decided to go with the phrase
"Elephant in the room".
We also wanted to try PICO-8 as it seemed such a good engine!SPOILER ALERT: It is!
Have fun!

Controls

Movement: Arrow keys
Action key: X
Assisted Mode: S
Restert room: C

Made by:

  • ekaktusz - Programming
  • Zahkros - Game design, Art, Music
  • bartalomew - Level design, Art
  • Mate Hirsch - Level design, game design
  • Lorinc Fazakas - Logo design, game design

Updates since submission deadline:

  • Removed debug information from the screen, we accidentally left on.

Music inspired by @noteheadmusic
